original_text: who risked their necks for my life, to whom not only I give thanks but all the churches of the Gentiles give thanks as well.
korean_text: 그들은 내 목숨을 위하여 자기들의 목까지도 내놓았나니 나뿐 아니라 이방인의 모든 교회도 그들에게 감사하느니라

sentences.original_text: who risked their necks for my life
to whom not only I give thanks
but all the churches of the Gentiles give thanks as well.
